Help:Node.title: approach
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: approach [object]
EXAMPLE: approach north wall; or approach queen
Moves nearer to the specified object. If the object is inanimate, you move into proximity with it (ie, "approach north wall" moves you to "near north wall". If the object is animate (ie, a person), the first approach moves you into the same proximity as the person (ie, if the person is "sitting on a chair" you will move to "near the chair") and a second approach will move into proximity with them ("near the Queen"). This second approach requires consent.
